description:
Truman just turned 18 a few months ago. He was starting his first week at a local university when a friend of mine spotted him on campus and asked him if he wanted to make a little extra money.

Truman is straight and he has a girlfriend. Because he's so young, I was surprised by how calm and nonchalant he was about the whole video thing. He's got a very handsome face, a sexy bush, and a big dick with a nice set of nuts.
title: Truman
